targets.query: SELECT count("battery_instant_power") FROM "http" WHERE ("url" = 'https://{your local tesla gateway IP address}/api/meters/aggregates' AND "battery_instant_power" > 0) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(none)

tags.value: https://{your local tesla gateway IP address}/api/meters/aggregates

targets.query: SELECT count("battery_instant_power") FROM "http" WHERE ("url" = 'https://{your local tesla gateway IP address}/api/meters/aggregates' AND "battery_instant_power" < 0) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)
